Question: In April 2012, CBS announced it had extended its contract with this person through 2014.
Hints: Winfrey interviewed this person in January 2013 on Oprah's Next Chapter.
From 1993–2009, this person ranked higher than Leno in the annual Harris Poll of Nation's Favorite TV Personality 12 times.
On October 5, 2009, this person devoted a segment of his show to a public apology to his wife and staff.
